EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining us at Pisco Bar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]>
Thank you for joining us at Pisco Bar
Martell Malaysia hosted the event on 13th April in collaboration with Pisco Bar and we hope you enjoyed yourself.
If you would like to be invited to similar events in the future and be the first to hear about upcoming collaborations, events and happenings, sign up to Martell’s guest list here and we will keep you in the loop.
SIGN UP <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MY_MRT_1610_EVNT_Tablet_signup_Page---Registration.html?utm-source=piscobarapril2017]]>
<[[https://www.facebook.com/martell]]>
<[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdVXhxfLa-zc7OUaoiUcsBA]]>
<[[https://www.pinterest.com/martell/]]>
<[[https://twitter.com/martellcognac]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
